name: Ailuri (DEMO) (KICKSTARTER)
description:
Play as Ailuri to run, climb, swing and survive through hand drawn, detailed levels. Rescue animals, defeat enemies and discover your true, hidden abilities.

Features

This demo includes the first two levels of the game, but if you complete the collectables, a challenging boss level will become available.

There are three hidden animals to discover in the levels, explore the game to find them.

If you're keen to support our game on Kickstarter, check it out here!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1867450639/ailuri-a-hand-drawn-2d-platforme...
Both keyboard and controller are supported, controller is recommended.

TWO PLAYER Co-Op is included, just plug in a second controller and hold  Y/ Triangle in the menu to spawn the second player.

Linux and Mac support coming soon.
 Have fun! Let us know what you think!

Ailuri centers around raising awareness for endangered species!
All characters are based off existing endangered flora or fauna. Discover them and learn more about their endangered status in the game.
